name: All-Dressed Fries
description: Introducing the iconic, all-dressed potato chip flavour: it’s a True North classic with a loyal and dedicated Canadian fan base. We’ve bottled up that savoury, sweet, and tangy goodness with a whopping 14 ingredients in our special fries seasoning. It’s like having the best of salt & vinegar, ketchup, sour cream & onion, and BBQ chips, all mingling together to make your favourite fries even better!
preparation:
1. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
  2. Arrange fries on pan and sprinkle with 1 tbsp seasoning; toss to coat. 
  3. Cook fries according to package directions. Sprinkle cooked fries with remaining 1 tbsp seasoning before serving.
